verses.verse: The word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> came<WH1961> unto<WH413> me again, saying,<WH559>

What <WH4100> mean ye, that ye<WH859> use<WH4911> this<WH2088> <WH853> proverb<WH4912> concerning<WH5921> the land<WH127> of Israel,<WH3478> saying,<WH559> The fathers<WH1> have eaten<WH398> sour grapes,<WH1155> and the children's<WH1121> teeth<WH8127> are set on edge?<WH6949>
As I<WH589> live,<WH2416> saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> GOD,<WH3069> ye shall not<WH518> have<WH1961> occasion any more<WH5750> to use<WH4911> this<WH2088> proverb<WH4912> in Israel.<WH3478>

Behold, <WH2005> all<WH3605> souls<WH5315> are mine; as the soul<WH5315> of the father,<WH1> so also the soul<WH5315> of the son<WH1121> is mine: the soul<WH5315> that sinneth,<WH2398> it<WH1931> shall die.<WH4191>
But if<WH3588> a man<WH376> be<WH1961> just,<WH6662> and do<WH6213> that which is lawful<WH4941> and right,<WH6666>

And hath not<WH3808> eaten<WH398> upon<WH413> the mountains,<WH2022> neither<WH3808> hath lifted up<WH5375> his eyes<WH5869> to<WH413> the idols<WH1544> of the house<WH1004> of Israel,<WH3478> neither<WH3808> hath defiled<WH2930> his neighbor's<WH7453> wife,<WH802> neither<WH3808> hath come near<WH7126> to<WH413> a menstruous<WH5079> woman,<WH802>

And hath not<WH3808> oppressed<WH3238> any,<WH376> but hath restored<WH7725> to the debtor<WH2326> his pledge,<WH2258> hath spoiled<WH1497> none<WH3808> by violence,<WH1500> hath given<WH5414> his bread<WH3899> to the hungry,<WH7457> and hath covered<WH3680> the naked<WH5903> with a garment;<WH899>

He that hath not<WH3808> given forth<WH5414> upon usury,<WH5392> neither<WH3808> hath taken<WH3947> any increase,<WH8636> that hath withdrawn<WH7725> his hand<WH3027> from iniquity,<WH4480> <WH5766> hath executed<WH6213> true<WH571> judgment<WH4941> between<WH996> man<WH376> and man,<WH376>

Hath walked<WH1980> in my statutes,<WH2708> and hath kept<WH8104> my judgments,<WH4941> to deal<WH6213> truly;<WH571> he<WH1931> is just,<WH6662> he shall surely live,<WH2421> <WH2421> saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> GOD.<WH3069>
If he beget<WH3205> a son<WH1121> that is a robber,<WH6530> a shedder<WH8210> of blood,<WH1818> and that doeth<WH6213> the like<WH251> to any one<WH4480> <WH259> of these<WH4480> <WH428> things,

And that<WH1931> doeth<WH6213> not<WH3808> <WH853> any<WH3605> of those<WH428> duties, but<WH3588> even<WH1571> hath eaten<WH398> upon<WH413> the mountains,<WH2022> and defiled<WH2930> his neighbor's<WH7453> wife,<WH802>

Hath oppressed<WH3238> the poor<WH6041> and needy,<WH34> hath spoiled<WH1497> by violence,<WH1500> hath not<WH3808> restored<WH7725> the pledge,<WH2258> and hath lifted up<WH5375> his eyes<WH5869> to<WH413> the idols,<WH1544> hath committed<WH6213> abomination,<WH8441>

Hath given forth<WH5414> upon usury,<WH5392> and hath taken<WH3947> increase:<WH8636> shall he then live?<WH2421> he shall not<WH3808> live:<WH2421> he hath done<WH6213> <WH853> all<WH3605> these<WH428> abominations;<WH8441> he shall surely die;<WH4191> <WH4191> his blood<WH1818> shall be<WH1961> upon him.

Now, lo,<WH2009> if he beget<WH3205> a son,<WH1121> that seeth<WH7200> <WH853> all<WH3605> his father's<WH1> sins<WH2403> which<WH834> he hath done,<WH6213> and considereth,<WH7200> and doeth<WH6213> not<WH3808> such like,

That hath not<WH3808> eaten<WH398> upon<WH5921> the mountains,<WH2022> neither<WH3808> hath lifted up<WH5375> his eyes<WH5869> to<WH413> the idols<WH1544> of the house<WH1004> of Israel,<WH3478> hath not<WH3808> defiled<WH2930> his neighbor's<WH7453> <WH853> wife,<WH802>

Neither <WH3808> hath oppressed<WH3238> any,<WH376> hath not<WH3808> withheld<WH2254> the pledge,<WH2258> neither<WH3808> hath spoiled<WH1497> by violence,<WH1500> but hath given<WH5414> his bread<WH3899> to the hungry,<WH7457> and hath covered<WH3680> the naked<WH5903> with a garment,<WH899>

That hath taken off<WH7725> his hand<WH3027> from the poor,<WH4480> <WH6041> that hath not<WH3808> received<WH3947> usury<WH5392> nor increase,<WH8636> hath executed<WH6213> my judgments,<WH4941> hath walked<WH1980> in my statutes;<WH2708> he<WH1931> shall not<WH3808> die<WH4191> for the iniquity<WH5771> of his father,<WH1> he shall surely live.<WH2421> <WH2421>

As for his father,<WH1> because<WH3588> he cruelly oppressed,<WH6231> <WH6233> spoiled<WH1497> his brother<WH251> by violence,<WH1499> and did<WH6213> that which<WH834> is not<WH3808> good<WH2896> among<WH8432> his people,<WH5971> lo,<WH2009> even he shall die<WH4191> in his iniquity.<WH5771>

Yet say<WH559> ye, Why?<WH4069> doth not<WH3808> the son<WH1121> bear<WH5375> the iniquity<WH5771> of the father?<WH1> When the son<WH1121> hath done<WH6213> that which is lawful<WH4941> and right,<WH6666> and hath kept<WH8104> <WH853> all<WH3605> my statutes,<WH2708> and hath done<WH6213> them, he shall surely live.<WH2421> <WH2421>

The soul<WH5315> that sinneth,<WH2398> it<WH1931> shall die.<WH4191> The son<WH1121> shall not<WH3808> bear<WH5375> the iniquity<WH5771> of the father,<WH1> neither<WH3808> shall the father<WH1> bear<WH5375> the iniquity<WH5771> of the son:<WH1121> the righteousness<WH6666> of the righteous<WH6662> shall be<WH1961> upon<WH5921> him, and the wickedness<WH7564> of the wicked<WH7563> shall be<WH1961> upon<WH5921> him.

But if<WH3588> the wicked<WH7563> will turn<WH7725> from all<WH4480> <WH3605> his sins<WH2403> that<WH834> he hath committed,<WH6213> and keep<WH8104> <WH853> all<WH3605> my statutes,<WH2708> and do<WH6213> that which is lawful<WH4941> and right,<WH6666> he shall surely live,<WH2421> <WH2421> he shall not<WH3808> die.<WH4191>

All <WH3605> his transgressions<WH6588> that<WH834> he hath committed,<WH6213> they shall not<WH3808> be mentioned<WH2142> unto him: in his righteousness<WH6666> that<WH834> he hath done<WH6213> he shall live.<WH2421>

Have I any pleasure at all<WH2654> <WH2654> that the wicked<WH7563> should die?<WH4194> saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> GOD:<WH3069> and not<WH3808> that he should return<WH7725> from his ways,<WH4480> <WH1870> and live?<WH2421>

But when the righteous<WH6662> turneth away<WH7725> from his righteousness,<WH4480> <WH6666> and committeth<WH6213> iniquity,<WH5766> and doeth<WH6213> according to all<WH3605> the abominations<WH8441> that<WH834> the wicked<WH7563> man doeth,<WH6213> shall he live?<WH2421> All<WH3605> his righteousness<WH6666> that<WH834> he hath done<WH6213> shall not<WH3808> be mentioned:<WH2142> in his trespass<WH4604> that<WH834> he hath trespassed,<WH4603> and in his sin<WH2403> that<WH834> he hath sinned,<WH2398> in them shall he die.<WH4191>

Yet ye say,<WH559> The way<WH1870> of the Lord<WH136> is not equal.<WH8505> <WH3808> Hear<WH8085> now,<WH4994> O house<WH1004> of Israel;<WH3478> Is not<WH3808> my way<WH1870> equal?<WH8505> are not<WH3808> your ways<WH1870> unequal?<WH3808> <WH8505>

When a righteous<WH6662> man turneth away<WH7725> from his righteousness,<WH4480> <WH6666> and committeth<WH6213> iniquity,<WH5766> and dieth<WH4191> in<WH5921> them; for his iniquity<WH5766> that<WH834> he hath done<WH6213> shall he die.<WH4191>

Again, when the wicked<WH7563> man turneth away<WH7725> from his wickedness<WH4480> <WH7564> that<WH834> he hath committed,<WH6213> and doeth<WH6213> that which is lawful<WH4941> and right,<WH6666> he<WH1931> shall save his soul alive.<WH2421> <WH853> <WH5315>

Because he considereth,<WH7200> and turneth away<WH7725> from all<WH4480> <WH3605> his transgressions<WH6588> that<WH834> he hath committed,<WH6213> he shall surely live,<WH2421> <WH2421> he shall not<WH3808> die.<WH4191>

Yet saith<WH559> the house<WH1004> of Israel,<WH3478> The way<WH1870> of the Lord<WH136> is not equal.<WH8505> <WH3808> O house<WH1004> of Israel,<WH3478> are not<WH3808> my ways<WH1870> equal?<WH8505> are not<WH3808> your ways<WH1870> unequal?<WH3808> <WH8505>

Therefore <WH3651> I will judge<WH8199> you, O house<WH1004> of Israel,<WH3478> every one<WH376> according to his ways,<WH1870> saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> GOD.<WH3069> Repent,<WH7725> and turn<WH7725> yourselves from all<WH4480> <WH3605> your transgressions;<WH6588> so iniquity<WH5771> shall not<WH3808> be<WH1961> your ruin.<WH4383>

Cast away<WH7993> from<WH4480> <WH5921> you<WH853> all<WH3605> your transgressions,<WH6588> whereby<WH834> ye have transgressed;<WH6586> and make<WH6213> you a new<WH2319> heart<WH3820> and a new<WH2319> spirit:<WH7307> for why<WH4100> will ye die,<WH4191> O house<WH1004> of Israel?<WH3478>
For <WH3588> I have no pleasure<WH2654> <WH3808> in the death<WH4194> of him that dieth,<WH4191> saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> GOD:<WH3069> wherefore turn<WH7725> yourselves, and live<WH2421> ye.
